resources.string: Error: no video found. Check link
Open video or song from Youtube app, click share button and choose YoutubeToMp3 OR paste a Youtube link here.
Connection error, please check your internet connection.
The file will be downloaded into Download folder
Notice: please don\'t download copyrighted videos and mp3s. We are not responsible for any legal liability. Users are responsible for their own download. This app uses youtubeinmp3.com
